title: Team Collaboration
description: Learn how to collaborate with your team using Plugged.in workspaces and profiles

overview.title: Overview
overview.introduction: Plugged.in's multi-profile system enables teams to collaborate effectively by organizing MCP servers into separate workspaces while maintaining security and isolation.

workspaces.title: Multiple Profiles
workspaces.description: Create separate profiles for different environments or teams

permissions.title: Access Control
permissions.description: Manage who can access specific servers and collections

createWorkspace.title: Step 1: Create Team Workspaces
createWorkspace.description: Set up profiles for different team environments

profiles.title: Create Profiles
profiles.description: Create separate profiles for different purposes:

inviteMembers.title: Step 2: Share with Team Members
inviteMembers.description: Make your servers and collections available to team members

share.title: Share Servers
share.description: Share individual servers or entire collections:
share.code: Server → Share → Copy Link or Make Public

collections.title: Create Team Collections
collections.description: Group related servers into collections for easier team onboarding and standardization.

inviteMembers.tip: Use descriptive names and comprehensive notes to help team members understand each server's purpose and configuration.

manageAccess.title: Step 3: Manage Access Control
manageAccess.description: Control who can access and use your shared resources

visibility.title: Visibility Settings
visibility.description: Configure whether servers are public (discoverable) or private (link-only access).

apikeys.title: API Key Management
apikeys.description: Generate and manage API keys for programmatic access:
apikeys.code: Settings → API Keys → Generate New Key

bestPractices.title: Step 4: Team Best Practices
bestPractices.description: Follow these practices for effective team collaboration

naming.title: Consistent Naming
naming.description: Use clear, consistent naming conventions across all team profiles and servers.

documentation.title: Document Everything
documentation.description: Add detailed notes to servers explaining configuration, use cases, and any special requirements.

versioning.title: Version Collections
versioning.description: Use collection versioning to track changes and maintain compatibility across team environments.
